sections.blog: For the latest updates and articles, please visit my blog.

construction.title: I'm glad that you're here, this website is in construction. Work In Progress!
construction.subtitle: Hoped you wouldn't scroll that far, but you did...

items.title: Master Thesis – Trustworthy LLMs in Industrial Contexts
items.description: Currently writing my Master’s thesis on 'Trustworthy LLMs in Industrial Contexts'. Using VLAs and vision-based RAG for generation of machining operation sequences from CAM datasets. Created an evaluation framework to assess correctness on industrial data. Focused on ensuring reliable propagation of input redactions, minimizing hallucinations, and deriving attention-based metrics for trust and safety in industrial AI.

items.title: Working Student – LLM, DL, Robustness and Best Practices
items.description: Updated and co-authored a Copier-based Python package template to enforce SafeMLOps best practices with CI/CD, security scanning, and automated documentation. Integrated GPU support, Poetry dependency management, and pre-commit hooks for reproducible ML development.

items.title: Working Student – Certification of Model Robustness
items.description: Maintained CNN (U-Net) segmentation pipelines while promoting open-source best practices. Used Poetry for dependency management and ensured reproducibility across platforms. Contributed to Siemens AI Summit deliverables and improved cross-team collaboration on legacy codebases using DVC.

items.title: Bachelor Thesis – Certification of Model Robustness
items.description: Completed a Bachelor’s thesis on 'Model Certification Against Natural Perturbations', aligning with EU AI Act compliance. Focused on parallelizing robustness estimation to detect misclassification under natural noise.

items.title: Intern – Prototype Development
items.description: Evaluated a new login concept, 'Fast Login', for in-car systems. Designed and tested Android prototypes, integrating Bluetooth Low Energy and AWS Lambda backends.

items.title: Co-Founder – Drone Development
items.description: Designed and built unmanned aerial vehicles for aerial operations and surveillance. Managed electronics, CAD, and flight control systems under a non-profit association.

items.title: Electronics Design Engineer
items.description: Developed and assembled custom electronic systems for laser cutting and embedded applications.

education.institution: ESIEA - École d'Ingénieur·e·s d'un numérique utile

backend.title: Backend
backend.text: Developed good knowledge of C, C++, C#, Swift, Kotlin, Java, Python (AWS scalable app) and Haskell in order to lead the projects that I’ve accomplished. Since a young age, working passionately both in and outside school in various fields such as programming and electronics.

frontend.title: Frontend
frontend.text: SwiftUI, SpriteKit, JavaScript (CSS), Bootstrap, Angular, JavaFX, React and more…

electronics.title: Electronics
electronics.text: Passionate about prototyping many different things on breadboards and PCBs. DIY lover.

modeling.title: 2D and 3D modeling
modeling.text: Modeling with open-source programs including Blender, Inkscape, and FreeCAD. After finishing modeling, I like to build my creations using 3D Printers, CNC machines, and Laser engravers.

items: 🔭 Ongoing work: Model Robustness at Siemens.
